page.title: 17DONCASTER SCHOOLS'F.A.
page.content: DONCASTER SCHOOLS'F.A. WON THE ENGLISH SCHOOLS' GILLETTE TROPHY FOR UNDER 15 SCHOOLBOYS FOR THE FIRST TIME IN THEIR HISTORY THIS SEASON. TO REACH THE FINAL THE BOYS BEGAN IN SEPTEMBER,1984 WITH A BYE,THEN BEAT KEIGHLEY,2-0 AND BRADFORD,2-0,AFTER A 3-3 DRAW IN DONCASTER.LATER WINS WERE BISHOP AUCKLAND (A),3-1;NEWCASTLE (H), 4-3 AND DERBY (H),1-0.IN ROUND 7, SOUTHAMPTON PROVED VERY DIFFICULT OPPOSITION.AFTER 1-1 AND 3-3 DRAWS, DONCASTER WON THE SECOND REPLAY AWAY, 3-0.STOCKPORT WERE BEATEN IN THE SEMI FINAL.IN THE TWO-LEGGED FINAL DONCASTER PLAYED MERTON ON 14TH MAY AT BELLE VUE,DONCASTER ROVERS' GROUND.A 2-1 SUCCESS WAS ACHIEVED.A WEEK LATER,AT WIMBLEDON,THE SCORE WAS 0-0. THE ADVANTAGE FROM THE FIRST LEG CARRIED DONCASTER THROUGH TO WIN THE Â£13,000 SOLID SILVER TROPHY.
